statements: SELECT * FROM CivilEngineeringDesignDrawings
SELECT project_name, designer_name FROM CivilEngineeringDesignDrawings WHERE project_id = '1a2b3c4d'
SELECT project_name, designer_name FROM CivilEngineeringDesignDrawings ORDER BY project_name ASC
SELECT project_name, designer_name FROM CivilEngineeringDesignDrawings WHERE designer_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM CivilEngineeringDesignDrawings WHERE project_name LIKE '%bridge%'
SELECT * FROM CivilEngineeringDesignDrawings WHERE project_name = 'Bridge Design';
SELECT project_name, designer_name FROM CivilEngineeringDesignDrawings WHERE designer_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_name, LENGTH(drawing_file) AS file_size FROM CivilEngineeringDesignDrawings ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT project_name, designer_name FROM CivilEngineeringDesignDrawings WHERE project_name LIKE '%Highway%' AND designer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM CivilEngineeringDesignDrawings WHERE project_id = '36f022aa-71b4-4c06-8b1e-e54d5f8906d6';
SELECT * FROM InfrastructureProjects;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM InfrastructureProjects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM InfrastructureProjects WHERE project_location='New York';
SELECT * FROM DesignDrawings WHERE drawing_name LIKE '%structural%';
SELECT project_id, drawing_name FROM DesignDrawings ORDER BY project_id ASC, drawing_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM InfrastructureProjects WHERE project_location = 'New York';
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM InfrastructureProjects WHERE project_name LIKE 'Bridge%';

SELECT project_id, project_name, COUNT(*) AS num_drawings FROM InfrastructureProjects JOIN DesignDrawings ON InfrastructureProjects.project_id = DesignDrawings.project_id GROUP BY project_id, project_name;
SELECT * FROM DesignDrawings ORDER BY drawing_name DESC;

SELECT project_name, project_location, COUNT(*) AS num_drawings FROM InfrastructureProjects LEFT JOIN DesignDrawings ON InfrastructureProjects.project_id = DesignDrawings.project_id GROUP BY project_name, project_location;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_location, project_start_date FROM infrastructure_projects;
SELECT * FROM design_drawings WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT engineer_id, engineer_name, engineer_experience_years FROM engineers WHERE engineer_specialization = 'Civil Engineer';
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM infrastructure_projects ORDER BY project_start_date DESC;
SELECT drawing_name, drawing_type FROM design_drawings WHERE drawing_type = 'Architectural' ORDER BY drawing_id ASC;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM infrastructure_projects WHERE project_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT drawing_name, drawing_type FROM design_drawings WHERE project_id = 1001;
SELECT engineer_name, engineer_specialization FROM engineers WHERE engineer_experience_years > 5;
SELECT project_name, project_start_date FROM infrastructure_projects ORDER BY project_start_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT engineer_name, engineer_experience_years FROM engineers ORDER BY engineer_experience_years ASC;
SELECT * FROM CivilEngineeringFirm;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM InfrastructureProjects;
SELECT engineer_name, engineer_role FROM Engineers;
SELECT firm_name, location FROM CivilEngineeringFirm;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM InfrastructureProjects;
SELECT * FROM CivilEngineeringFirm WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM InfrastructureProjects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT drawing_id, drawing_description FROM DesignDrawings WHERE project_id = 101 ORDER BY drawing_id ASC;
SELECT engineer_name, engineer_role FROM Engineers WHERE engineer_role = 'Senior Engineer' AND engineer_name LIKE 'P%';
SELECT firm_id, firm_name, location FROM CivilEngineeringFirm JOIN InfrastructureProjects ON CivilEngineeringFirm.firm_id = InfrastructureProjects.project_id;
SELECT * FROM Firm;
SELECT firm_name, location FROM Firm WHERE firm_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Project ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE firm_id = 2;
SELECT drawing_name, description FROM Drawing WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Firm WHERE firm_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE firm_id = 1 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT drawing_name, description FROM Drawing WHERE project_id = 10 AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT engineer_name, department FROM Engineer WHERE department = 'Mechanical' ORDER BY engineer_name ASC;
SELECT drawing_name, revision_number, revision_date FROM DrawingRevision WHERE revision_date >= '2022-01-01';
